LanguageData.DMS_Military01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] failed as a bandit and was unfortunately captured by a colonial group. While serving a labor sentence, [PAWN_nameDef] realized how much better the life of these people had and decided to stay after being released from prison.
LanguageData.DMS_Military01.title: Reformed Bandit
LanguageData.DMS_Military02.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a medic in the Colonial Forces and retired from military life prematurely after a serious injury.
LanguageData.DMS_Military02.title: Retired Medic
LanguageData.DMS_Military03.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Correctional Officer for the captured bandits and raiders, supervising them until they were free to go after serving their sentences.
LanguageData.DMS_Military03.title: Correctional Officer
LanguageData.DMS_Military04.description: After seeing the astonishing extent of this planet, [PAWN_nameDef] became a Voluntary Militia Trooper in the Colonial Forces. [PAWN_nameDef] transfered to various colonial strongholds in need of bodies, and had to use whatever was on hand to protect them.
LanguageData.DMS_Military04.title: Voluntary Militia
LanguageData.DMS_Military05.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the Colonist Physical Exam and only passed due to a clerical error. [PAWN_nameDef] has no special skills and followed the enlistment orders of the Colonial Fleet to receive simple training, enough to function as a substitute colonist. [PAWN_nameDef] was sent planetside to assist in the ongoing colonization work.
LanguageData.DMS_Military05.title: Reserve Colonist
LanguageData.DMS_Military06.description: Due to the chaotic distribution of the faction-controlled areas in most rim worlds, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to accompany the special police tasked with using limited violence to uproot the countless bandit camps infesting the planet one by one.
LanguageData.DMS_Military06.title: Riot Suppression Specialist
LanguageData.DMS_Military07.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for flying a transport shuttle containing people and materials across a large sector of the planet. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to solve a lot of annoying mechanical and human problems along the way.
LanguageData.DMS_Military07.title: Shuttle Pilot
LanguageData.DMS_Military08.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. To deal with the constant threats to their squad during the pioneering period, [PAWN_nameDef] used a healthy variety of firearms to kill anything that posed a threat to the colonists [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to protect.
LanguageData.DMS_Military08.title: Armed Escort
